title: SBI appoints ex-Ujjivan Small Finance Bank CEO Nitin Chugh as DMD - CNBCTV18
content: SBI appoints ex-Ujjivan Small Finance Bank CEO Nitin Chugh as DMD  CNBCTV18
description: Nitin Chugh would be responsible for envisioning, developing, and executing of bankâ€™s digital banking strategy and business plan for imparting digital knowledge/skills in a constructive, empowering, and collaborative way.
